title: Chinese Chess
desc: Developed an interactive Chinese Chess (also known as Xiangqi) web application. Currently, users are only able to play offline and support for online play is in the works

title: Tenzies
desc: Developed a simple Tenzies game. Embarked on this project to familiarise myself with front-end development

title: Anonymous telegram chat bot
desc: Developed a telegram bot that matches user randomly and anonymously in the safety of telegram. Learnt back-end development as well as certain aspects of dev-ops
